products.name: Premium Hoodie
products.description: Experience ultimate comfort with our Premium Hoodie. Made from high-quality materials, this hoodie features a soft interior, adjustable drawstring hood, front kangaroo pocket, and ribbed cuffs and hem.

products.name: Classic T-Shirt
products.description: Our Classic T-Shirt is a wardrobe essential. Made from 100% organic cotton, it offers both comfort and style for everyday wear.

products.name: Urban Sneakers
products.description: Step out in style with our Urban Sneakers. Featuring a comfortable fit, durable construction, and trendy design, these sneakers are perfect for any casual occasion.

products.name: Designer Cap
products.description: Top off your look with our Designer Cap. Featuring an adjustable strap for the perfect fit and embroidered logo on the front.

products.name: Graphic Sweatshirt
products.description: Make a statement with our Graphic Sweatshirt. Features bold designs on a comfortable cotton-polyester blend fabric.

products.name: Denim Jacket
products.description: Our classic Denim Jacket offers timeless style and durability. Perfect for layering in any season.

products.name: Leather Wallet
products.description: Keep your essentials organized with our genuine Leather Wallet. Features multiple card slots and a bill compartment.

products.name: Backpack
products.description: Carry your essentials in style with our durable Backpack. Features multiple compartments, padded laptop sleeve, and comfortable straps.

categories.name: Clothing
categories.description: Explore our collection of premium clothing items including hoodies, t-shirts, sweatshirts, and jackets.

categories.name: Footwear
categories.description: Step out in style with our selection of sneakers, boots, and casual shoes.

categories.name: Accessories
categories.description: Complete your look with our range of caps, wallets, backpacks, and more.
